product.name: Plants vs zombies garden warfare 2
product.description:
Dr. Zomboss conquered Suburbia and turned it into a plant-free paradise. Help the plants regain their turf in the new 24-player Herbal Assault, or choose your side in a 4-player co-op or solo game. With new modes, classes and loads of humour, Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2 lets you go to war with the serious (and your friends!) however you want.

Plants vs Zombies Garden Warfare 2 also introduces the Backyard Battleground, your very own interactive hub where you and up to 3 friends can go on daily quests and challenges and interact with your favorite PvZ characters. your likes.
product.briefDescription: Dr. Zomboss conquered Suburbia and turned it into a plant-free paradise.Help the plants regain their turf in the new 24-player Herbal Assault, or choose your side in a 4-player co-op or solo game.

product.name: The Sim 4
product.description: Unleash your imagination and create a completely unique Sims world. Explore and customize everything from Sims to family homes and more. Choose how Sims look, act, and dress. Determine how they will live each day. Design and build incredible homes for every family, then decorate with your favorite furniture and decorations. Travel to different neighborhoods where you can meet other Sims and learn about their lives. Explore beautiful locations with distinctive environments and go on spontaneous adventures. Manage the ups and downs of your Sims' daily lives and see what happens when you play out in real or imaginary situations. Tell your story your way while developing relationships, pursuing careers and living aspirations, and immersing yourself in an extraordinary game where the possibilities are endless.
product.briefDescription: Unleash your imagination and create a completely unique Sims world.Explore and customize everything from Sims to family homes and more.

product.description: Planet Coaster is a simulation game in the construction and management of amusement parks. In the game, the player will take on the role of a strategic investor who wants to invest in the entertainment sector. Players will have to survey and research the market to be able to quickly find the right land and build their own park.In Planet Coaster, players will have to design and build extremely detailed parts, from laying roads, building landscapes to placing amusement parks to be able to create a monumental job and attract many customers. . With a wide range of flexible features, you can unleash your creativity and design stunning and modern landscapes, even beyond the imagination of technologies you can see in real life. There are also interesting game modes and missions that will help you feel more excited when participating in this game.

In the game, the player will take on the role of a strategic investor who wants to invest in the entertainment sector. Players will have to survey and research the market to be able to quickly find the right land and build their own park.

product.name: Horizon Zero Dawn
product.description:
Experience Aloy's entire legendary quest to unravel the mysteries of a world ruled by deadly machines.
Outcast from her tribe, the young hunter fights to uncover her past, uncover her fate... and stop a catastrophic threat to the future. Launch devastating, tactical attacks against unique machines and rival tribes as you explore an open world teeming with wildlife and danger.
Horizon Zero Dawn™ is an award-winning action role-playing game – and this Complete Edition for PC includes the massive expansion The Frozen Wilds, featuring new lands, skills, weapons and Machine.

product.name: The Scapists
product.description:
The Escapists is a unique prisoner sandbox experience with lots of items to craft and combine in your daring quest for freedom. Life in prison will help you stay confident with strict rules that you will have to break.The guards are out to thwart any escape attempts, so you'll have to avoid suspicious behavior by attending roll call calls, doing prison work, and hiding your stolen crafts.
Running away is what you do best and you will have to prove your skills in many challenging prisons from around the world.
product.briefDescription: The Escapists is a unique prisoner sandbox experience with lots of items to craft and combine in your daring quest for freedom. Life in prison will help you stay confident with strict rules that you will have to break.

product.name: BATTLEPASS Glory Scroll
product.description:
Working alongside Aoi's childhood friend, Ageha Himegi, the protagonists of this visual novel set out to rebuild the Soaring Club, which was on the brink of disintegration at the hands of a council. school administration.These beginners embrace their passion, overcoming setbacks, obstacles and school interference to put everything they have into building their own functioning roller coaster.
Their ultimate goal: fly over the legendary “Morning Glory” ― a rare and beautiful weather phenomenon that produces a special kind of roll-shaped cloud that appears in the morning when conditions are right.

product.name: Galactic Civilizations III
product.description: The human race has finally mastered faster-than-light travel opening up the stars for exploration and colonization. As the leader of the newly formed Terran Alliance, you will guide humanity's expansion into becoming a space-based civilization. Soon, you will discover that we are not alone.Alien civilizations with their own histories and motivations are expanding as well. Research new technology, design starships, negotiate trade and treaties, wage wars, colonize new worlds, construct starbases in the largest 4X strategy game ever made. And when you've finished that, play again as one of the many included alien civilizations each with its own history, technology tree, ship components and more.

product.name: Crying Suns
product.description: Crying Suns is a unique strategy game themed in space war, in which you will play as the commander of a space fleet and tasked with uncovering a mysterious empire. This game is inspired by Dune and Foundation, each successful mission will help you uncover the truth about the Empire and your own origins. In the game Crying Suns, you will play as a clone of Ellys Idaho - the best Royal Admiral to ever conquer the universe. You have just been awakened on the planet Gehenna by Kaliban - the only OMNI that still exists. Your mission is to skillfully steer a battleship through the chaotic battles of the Empire, reactivate the OMNI and save the future of humanity. But you have to leave Gehenna now because time is running out…
product.briefDescription: Crying Suns is a unique strategy game themed in space war, in which you will play as the commander of a space fleet and tasked with uncovering a mysterious empire. blog.nameBlog: The 25 best games on Xbox Game Pass
blog.description:
Here's what you should play on Xbox and PC
With Microsoft's acquisition of Bethesda early last year, the service added a host of beloved games like Skyrim and Fallout 3. And with Microsoft's recent announcement that it's acquiring Activision Blizzard, Xbox Game Pass's reputation as the best deal in video games is likely to expand even further. It's likely - though unconfirmed - that we could see games like Overwatch, Diablo 3, and possibly even World of Warcraft join the Game Pass line in the next few years.

But the service already has a massive, colorful library of indie and AAA games from across industries. More games launch on Game Pass on release day than ever, and most are also available on Windows PC with PC Game Pass, which is included with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate.

With such a large number and variety, it is difficult to separate the wheat from the husk. But we are here to help. Here are the 25 best PC and Xbox Game Pass games that are worth your time.
blog.name: Andrew Shouldice

blog.nameBlog: How to download Tidal and install Tidal on Android/iOS phones
blog.description:
Although there is no shortage of music streaming services. Examples: YouTube Music, Spotify, Apple Music, Tidal – they all work on any smartphone or desktop computer, have millions of songs, support smart speakers, and often come with premium plans lets you play music on demand, without ads. However, most of these music streaming services lack one big aspect – sound quality. And that's where Tidal comes in. Tidal is one of the few music streaming services that allows you to stream “lossless” high-quality uncompressed music.
How to download and install Tidal on Android
Before we start, we need to install the Tidal app on the smartphone. It is possible that you cannot find the 'Tidal' Google Play app. Don't worry, you can easily get the APK to bypass the country restrictions. Just search for “TIDAL APK” on Google or click this link to download APKMirror.

blog.nameBlog: Instructions to play gta 5 online with FiveM are very simple
blog.description:
GTA V Online on the computer has been played by a lot of people in recent times. With an open world game mode and many very realistic simulation features, GTA V Online is chosen by many of you to play with friends. To play GTA V Online, you need the game on Steam or the Epic Store. Besides, you need FiveM to find the right Server. In this article, I will show you how to play GTA V Online with FiveM.

How to play GTA V Online with FiveM
First, you open and log in to Steam to download the FiveM application at: https://fivem.net/ as an exe file. Then you install the app as usual. In addition, you can quickly access it using the link below. To download the FiveM application to play GTA V online quickly.
Install and update FiveM
Step 1: After successful installation, log in to your Cfx.re account. If you do not have an account, select the Register line or if you forget your password, select Send password reset email so that the password is recovered from the email.
Step 2: To register for a Cfx.re account, you need to prepare your email, account name and password in advance.
Step 3: Then, you check your registered email, there will be an email from Cfx.re sent. Click on the link to confirm your account.
Step 4: Then you go back to FiveM app and select Check Verification.Step 4: Then you go back to FiveM app and select Check Verification.
Step 5: Then, the application will report Account Linked that your account has been confirmed. On the main screen to use, select Play to start choosing Sever to play.
Step 6: You can search Sever by country with the national flag image in front, you can play in Vietnam Server for the fastest speed.
Step 7: Once you have selected which server, select Connect to connect to and play.

blog.description:
Online games are very popular, but there are still many good offline games for PC to choose from.

In terms of gaming flexibility, no other platform can match the PC. It's a platform that has a lot of advantages for those who can get past the often daunting price point. As a bonus, while consoles require a monthly subscription fee to play games online, the majority of PC games are free. Despite that, many people enjoy playing games offline.

One can spend hundreds of hours playing an offline PC game and have no regrets. Here are the best offline PC games to play right now.

blog.nameBlog: Blockbuster Battlefield 1 and Battlefield 5 are free on PC through Prime Gaming
blog.description:
Starting from July 21 to August 4, gamers who subscribe to the Amazon Prime Gaming service will receive a free version of Battlefield 1 for PC. And yet, in 2 months from August 2, 2021 to October 1, 2021, they will also receive Battlefield 5 PC version. Prime Gaming is a subscription service under Amazon Prime that provides subscribers to Twitch, exclusive game content, and especially free game titles on a regular basis.

How to get Battlefield 1 and Battlefield 5 for free
Visit the Amazon Prime Gaming homepage at: https://gaming.amazon.com/intro
Click the Try Prime button and log in to an existing account or sign up for a new account.
After logging in, you will be asked to confirm details including email, payment method, etc.
Click the “Start your free trial – pay later” button
Once you are an Amazon Prime Gaming member, visit the following link to receive Battlefield 1 https://gaming.amazon.com/loot/battlefield1
Free Battlefield 5: https://gaming.amazon.com/loot/battlefieldv

blog.description:
They are also not limited to one genre. When it comes to the best games, you've got quite a selection of titles, from the best MMOs or MOBAs and beautiful open world games in which you can do just about anything, even games. Best Co-Op game to play with friends.
Death Stranding is attracting a lot of attention not only to the big names associated with it, but incidentally including Mads Mikkelsen and Léa Seydoux. As porter Sam Bridges, you bravely cross an apocalyptic America to deliver valuable goods, navigating these lands plagued by terrorists, bandits, and invisible creatures called Beached Things. This award-winning action game is also a treat for all the senses, thanks to its wonderful storyline, possibly reminiscent of the current pandemic, good gameplay, exciting missions and sounds. and impressive images.
The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is aging like fine wine. Even a few years after its release, it's still one of the most impressive open-world games to ever exist - blending the scale of Skyrim with the incredible depth of Grand Theft Auto V. It's a game that controls fun, that's why it's nominated for the top spot on the list of the best games of 2020. It's amazing, beautiful, and it will immerse you - in a good way - The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is not only the best PC game of 2020, it is also one of the best open world games on PC, one of the best games of all time.

You can absolutely buy goods on the Website without having an account. However, you should register an account to use the full functionality of the website.
For the Game you can't find because many products have not been uploaded, you can message the shop to check the status of the goods here https://www.facebook.com/muaga.meshop

You can pre-load your Wallet for faster purchases. If you want to buy goods with a scratch card, you must pre-load it into your Wallet.

comment.content: Duis voluptatum. Id vis consequat consetetur dissentiet, ceteros commune perpetua mei et. Simul viderer facilisis egimus tractatos splendi.
